During their first court case after graduation, SIU-YUE suspects that LIK-WANG has won the case by playing tricks and they hate each other even more. SIU-YUE meets the TV anchor MOK HEI-LOI (Grace Wong) after losing his love. They get married swiftly but they separate after a few months. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Journey to Guilin & What's On Today
programme.desc: The "Journey to Guilin" series heads north again to uncover more information on food, shopping, and entertainment. This time, Nancy Sit teams up with Matthew Ho and Brian Lam to explore Guilin in Guangxi, a place renowned for its breathtaking landscapes. Together, they gather travel tips that combine unique landforms, stunning scenery, and delicious local cuisine. The group visits famous attractions such as Elephant Trunk Hill, the Li River, and Longji Rice Terraces. They take a cable car up Yao Mountain and venture into ancient underground caves to experience the "three wonders" of Guilin: lush mountains, clear waters, and mysterious caves. The team enjoys a variety of local delicacies and experiences in Guilin, tasting Guangxi oil tea, rice noodles, Lipu taro, the "Osmanthus Banquet," and the "Kumquat Banquet," among other authentic flavors. They also try on traditional ethnic costumes to immerse themselves in the local culture.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60's in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development. He, KEUNG and HUI MAN BILL (Chan Kam Hung, Sunny) organized a development company and earned their first bucket of gold. When TIM was happy with his achievement, his enemy had broken his brother's legs. TIM suffered a great blow and decided to reform. On the other hand, BILL, stressed on principle, was surprised to find that his respected master in fact was corrupt.

programme.title: Clash Of Home Chefs
programme.desc: Home-cooked meals may seem ordinary on the surface, but in reality, they require careful planning, a balance suitable for all ages, and a focus on health and flavorâ€”all thanks to the culinary skills of the family's chef. Fourteen contestants each presented their unique recipes, facing hosts Nancy Sit, Archie Sin, Tiffany Fabienne Kwan, and Nicholas Yuen, as well as judge "Third Sister" Kitty Siu, star guests and their families for tasting and evaluation. The fourteen participants were divided into seven teams to compete in the kitchen, battling it out with designated ingredients and two signature dishes of their choice. The seven winning teams advanced directly, while among the losing teams, the contestant with the most "Delicious Star Badges" could also move forward. Afterwards, the eight remaining contestants were split into groups of four for head-to-head competition, with the top scorer from each groupâ€”making a total of twoâ€”entering the ultimate showdown to vie for the title of "Champion Chef."

programme.title: Syawal Mencari Cinta
programme.desc: Pada pagi Raya, Syawal melepak bersama rakannya dan mereka tidak menunaikan solat sunat Hari Raya. Setelah selesai solat sunat Hari Raya, dia ternampak seorang gadis yang tidak pernah dilihatnya di kampung sebelum ini. Syawal terus berkesimpulan bahawa dia telah menemui cinta sejati. Dia telah mengunjung setiap rumah di kampung untuk menjejaki gadis tersebut. Selepas sekian lama mencari tanpa membuahkan hasil, Syawal terus mengumumkan kepada seluruh kampung bahawa dia akan melaksanakan rumah terbuka untuk hari raya dan semua orang dijemput hadir ke rumahnya. Namun demikian, setelah selesai rumah terbukanya, gadis yang dicari-cari Syawal masih tidak kelihatan. Dia kecewa lalu berputus asa. Tanpa sedar, gadis yang dijejaki selama ini adalah Cinta, sepupunya sendiri.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era

TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development. He, KEUNG and HUI MAN BILL (Chan Kam Hung, Sunny) organized a development company and earned their first bucket of gold. When TIM was happy with his achievement, his enemy had broken his brother's legs. TIM suffered a great blow and decided to reform. On the other hand, BILL, stressed on principle, was surprised to find that his respected master in fact was corrupt.

programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a 'Fire master' in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING's third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. programme.title: Journey to Guilin
programme.desc: The "Journey to Guilin" series heads north again to uncover more information on food, shopping, and entertainment. This time, Nancy Sit teams up with Matthew Ho and Brian Lam to explore Guilin in Guangxi, a place renowned for its breathtaking landscapes. Together, they gather travel tips that combine unique landforms, stunning scenery, and delicious local cuisine. The group visits famous attractions such as Elephant Trunk Hill, the Li River, and Longji Rice Terraces. They take a cable car up Yao Mountain and venture into ancient underground caves to experience the "three wonders" of Guilin: lush mountains, clear waters, and mysterious caves. The team enjoys a variety of local delicacies and experiences in Guilin, tasting Guangxi oil tea, rice noodles, Lipu taro, the "Osmanthus Banquet," and the "Kumquat Banquet," among other authentic flavors. They also try on traditional ethnic costumes to immerse themselves in the local culture.

programme.desc: In this fast-food era of digitized books and chapters, where a smartphone can reveal all the world's happenings, few people still maintain the habit of reading. Patrick Sir, a well-read bibliophile, joins forces with young readers like Oscar Tao and Honey Ho to reaffirm the value of physical books. Each episode introduces a great book, opening up scientific texts, historical literature, novels, and even fashion magazines to share interesting knowledge discovered within the pages. programme.title: Gods Of Honour
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a 'Fire master' in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING's third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. NAR JAR pulls himself together again under his mother and friends' help and fights against ZHOU's army for the civilians.

"The Strongest Lifeline" helps you unravel the secrets to good health. To start, the program features a four-episode series on common urban pain issues, covering headaches, shoulder and neck pain, back pain, and joint pain. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of these conditions, as well as physical therapists and exercise specialists to teach appropriate exercises. With the growing trend of integrating Eastern and Western medicine, even American swimming champion Michael Phelps uses cupping therapy to relieve pain. Therefore, each episode also includes traditional Chinese medical diagnosis, complemented by treatments such as acupuncture, cupping, and the â€œSanfuâ€� herbal patch therapy, which is especially suitable during the hottest days of summer. In addition, Chinese medicine practitioners share recipes for nourishing soups, all of which can help regulate and improve your health.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty

programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: Journey to Guilin
programme.desc: The "Journey to Guilin" series heads north again to uncover more information on food, shopping, and entertainment. This time, Nancy Sit teams up with Matthew Ho and Brian Lam to explore Guilin in Guangxi, a place renowned for its breathtaking landscapes. Together, they gather travel tips that combine unique landforms, stunning scenery, and delicious local cuisine. The group visits famous attractions such as Elephant Trunk Hill, the Li River, and Longji Rice Terraces. They take a cable car up Yao Mountain and venture into ancient underground caves to experience the "three wonders" of Guilin: lush mountains, clear waters, and mysterious caves. The team enjoys a variety of local delicacies and experiences in Guilin, tasting Guangxi oil tea, rice noodles, Lipu taro, the "Osmanthus Banquet," and the "Kumquat Banquet," among other authentic flavors. They also try on traditional ethnic costumes to immerse themselves in the local culture.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a 'Fire master' in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING's third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. NAR JAR pulls himself together again under his mother and friends' help and fights against ZHOU's army for the civilians.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: Urban dwellers often experience a hectic pace of life and high levels of stress, making them more susceptible to health problems. "The Strongest Lifeline" helps you unravel the secrets to good health. To start, the program features a four-episode series on common urban pain issues, covering headaches, shoulder and neck pain, back pain, and joint pain. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of these conditions, as well as physical therapists and exercise specialists to teach appropriate exercises. With the growing trend of integrating Eastern and Western medicine, even American swimming champion Michael Phelps uses cupping therapy to relieve pain. Therefore, each episode also includes traditional Chinese medical diagnosis, complemented by treatments such as acupuncture, cupping, and the â€œSanfuâ€� herbal patch therapy, which is especially suitable during the hottest days of summer. In addition, Chinese medicine practitioners share recipes for nourishing soups, all of which can help regulate and improve your health.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a 'Fire master' in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING's third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy.
